EFFECTIVETRAY.ExpandEffectSettingHint: The effect tray on chat messages starts in its expanded position when the message is created.
EFFECTIVETRAY.FilterPermissionSettingHin: Require users have the selected permissions to see and apply effects from the tray.
EFFECTIVETRAY.IgnoreNPCSettingHint: Disallow users from seeing or interacting with effects from NPCs they do not own.
EFFECTIVETRAY.RemoveTransferSettingName: Remove 'Apply Effect to Actor' from timed effects.
EFFECTIVETRAY.RemoveTransferSettingHint: On the time of creation (drag & drop), remove 'Apply Effect to Actor' from effects on items that have a duration to allow for normal use of the timer.
EFFECTIVETRAY.SystemDefaultSettingHint: Retain default system behavior (if you just want the expanded tray).
